text: Snow White's Wedding Cake
The Evil Queen and a bite of an apple!
The Brave Prince and the Seven Dwarfs!
Yes, she is Snow White!
Snow White wants a nice wedding cake.
It’s John’s bakery, the greedy bear.
It looks just the same as Jane's.
Even cakes and breads!
Jane bakes the cake.
Jane makes the cake as a plan.
Jane puts a cover on the cake.
Jane puts the cake on the bike.
Jane comes riding a bike.
John hides in the bush.
He rolls a pipe to the road.
Oh, my!
Jane falls because of the pipe.
Jane cries loudly.
Little letters make a cake and a cane.
And they make a name and a bike.
Jane gets on time.
How happy they are!
Jane dives in joy.
Why is the snake angry?
